transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye.

Executive: Haan main bol raha hu yaar kya baat hai?

Customer: Sir actually Priyanshu lunch kar raha tha to uska call mere pe transfer ho gaya lunch ki timing thi aap kaun si company se baat kar rahe bataiye sir main uski senior baat kar rahi hu.

Customer: Birla Birla stone se bol raha hu main to.

Executive: Achcha achcha to abhi Priyanshu na lunch se jaise hi free hota hai 3:30 ke around aapko wo directly call kar lega sir theek hai?

Customer: Meri baat to suno.

Executive: Haan haan bataiye.

Customer: Aap senior bol rahe hain ya

Executive: Nahi main senior baat kar rahi hu. Kya senior.

Customer: To Birla stone mein kuch kaam hi nahi aa raha ji.

Executive: Achcha achcha haan haan theek hai to main wahi keh rahi hu sir ki Priyanshu ek bar aapko call kar lega.

Customer: Priyanshu Priyanshu se mere kya baat baat to aap senior hai to aap baat to suno meri.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Kaam hi nahi aa raha Birla stone mein kaam hi nahi aa raha kuch bhi. 5 lakh ka package leke raha hai koi lead hi nahi aa rahi dhanki koi.

Executive: Lead dhanki koi bhi nahi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan lead hi nahi aa rahi kuch. Kisko shikayat karu bataiye aap.

Executive: Nahi shikayat karne ki baat nahi hai sir main ek bar dekhti hu na aapka kya open karke main bhi lunch pe hi hu sir. Main bhi lunch pe hi hu abhi main bhi abhi lunch hi kar rahi hu.

Customer: To main kisko bolu bataiye mere ko.

Executive: Sir abhi aap mujhe hi bologe Priyanshu ko hi bologe office ki baat hai sir hum hi dono aapka account handle kar rahe hain.

Customer: To aap paise lene dete ho to upar se upar upar se upar se upar fraud karne lage the.

Executive: To sir fraud sa aapne paise sir time pe de diya tha theek hai main ek bar connect karti hu baat karti hu.

Customer: Mere ko paisa baki thodi hai to lead thodi chahiye na.

Executive: Lead hi nahi aa rahi koi mandir ki. Check to kar lu check to kar lu kahan pe kya dikkat aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan check kar lo.

Executive: Haan wahi dekh lete hain ek bari na theek hai dekh kar ke aapko batati hu sir theek hai 3 baje ke around call karti hu ek bari.

Customer: Aap hi karoge call aap hi karoge call Priyanshu bhi karega wo.

Executive: Call Priyanshu karega sir 3:30 baje ek bar aapko call karega wo ek bar main usse discuss kar leti hu theek hai.

Customer: Iske liye aap phone ki.

Executive: Haan aati hai 3:30 baje tak call aa jayegi aapke pass 3:00 se 3:30 ke beech mein theek hai. Call aa jayegi sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads are being generated from Birla Stone.

- Expressed frustration about spending 5 lakhs without results.

- Wants to know who to complain to about the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive assured the customer she would investigate.

- Priyanshu will call the customer around 3:30 PM.

- Executive will discuss the issue with Priyanshu.



Next Steps: 

- Priyanshu will call the customer around 3:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, call
